label: 殿上人
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: The rank of nobles capable of having an audience in the imperial palace. In addition to the highest three ranks of nobility (kugyō), members of the fourth and fifth rank were included as well. At times, members of the secretariat (kurōdo 蔵人) of the sixth rank could also be classified as tenjō bito. [公卿]
